page.title: 16Liverpool Newsham,Industry
page.content: Our area has 3 types of industry: 1) Older manufacturing/engineering. Found throughout area. Large factories inc. Plessey Telecommunications, Imperial Tobacco Ltd., United Biscuits and Taverner Rutledge. 2) Modern small factory units attract new industries. These tend to employ less than 20 people and not all units are taken. 3) Wavertree Hi_Technology Park, a new development on derelict rail property. A 64 acre landscaped park has been made for Hi_Tech industries. The first unit was opened in April 1985. It is hoped to attract 2000 jobs. In general industry is contracting, factories are closing or making redundancies. There is a high level of unemployment.
